member.name: T:MarkdownMvcLibrary.MarkdownHelper
member.summary: An HTML Helper that renders markdown.

member.name: M:MarkdownMvcLibrary.MarkdownHelper.Markdown(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,System.String)

member.param: The file with the markdown content to be rendered

member.name: T:MarkdownMvcLibrary.NotARazorViewException
member.summary: Exception thrown when a view which isn't a Razor view is used with the helper.

member.name: T:MarkdownMvcLibrary.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:MarkdownMvcLibrary.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:MarkdownMvcLibrary.Properties.Resources.Style
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to h1,h2{color:#000}blockquote,h6{color:#777}hr,pre>code{background:0 0}dl dt,table th{font-weight:700}a,abbr,acronym,address,applet,article,aside,audio,b,big,blockquote,body,canvas,caption,center,cite,code,dd,del,details,dfn,div,dl,dt,em,embed,fieldset,figcaption,figure,footer,form,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,header,hgroup,html,i,iframe,img,ins,kbd,label,legend,li,mark,menu,nav,object,ol,output,p,pre,q,ruby,s,samp,section,small,span,strike,strong,sub,summary,sup,table,tbody,td,tfoot,th,thead,time,tr,tt,u,ul,var,video{m [rest of string was truncated]";.
